source: This Field is configured to display an 16:9 small image on fullContent.

This Field is configured to display on different image (with different crop zone/ratio) depending on BARTIK breakpoint by default on fullContent.
Image Style dependin breakpoint :
  • Wide (min-width: 851px) => Small - (320 x 180) with crop 16:9
  • NARROW (min-width: 851px to max-width: 850px) => Medium with crop simple
  • MOBILE => Medium - (300 x 330) with crop 4:3
  • FALLBACK => Small - (320 x 180) with crop 16:9

To exepriment different reaction change configuration HERE
